title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description:
- Led the Network Request Middleware project to unify over 10 fragmented network request patterns into a single, type-safe API, supporting multi-workspace architecture under one URL.
- Designed a robust request system supporting CSRF refresh, session handling, streaming responses, and micro-frontend isolation.
- Built a multi-level error monitoring system to improve internal reliability despite low test coverage, spanning from fetch adapters to React Query and GraphQL clients.
- Designed and launched the Top Navigation Bar and the new homepage.
- Contributed to the File Browser, improving user experience and reliability.

title: Principal Frontend Engineer
description:
- As the most senior frontend engineer on the founding team, designed and implemented core architecture for WebForms, a no-code app builder.
- Built high-performance rendering logic, key features like dynamic schema updates and user logic flows, and contributed to the drag-and-drop UX.
- Defined frontend coding standards and mentored new engineers.
- Collaborated with backend, design, and QA teams to launch on schedule with strong product feedback.

title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description:
- Led the UI platform team for AWS SageMaker, delivering foundational components used across the product.
- Created a frontend sync engine for collaborative app editing in the Honeycode builder: handled real-time sync, optimistic updates, conflict resolution, and offline fallback.
- Improved frontend performance for Honeycode by optimizing rendering and data sync.
- Enhanced Amazon.com performance by refining caching strategies.

title: Senior Software Design Engineer
description:
-Built frontend features and developer tools for Azure ML and Windows 8 apps.
- Early contributor to JavaScript-based Windows Store apps and internal design system tooling.
